entry.title: Current Conditions: 8.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Daniel's Harbour 3:30 PM NDT Sunday 08 May 2016
Temperature: 8.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.2 kPa falling
Humidity: 79 %
Dewpoint: 4.8°C
Wind: 0 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of rain or drizzle. Low 7.
entry.summary: Periods of rain or drizzle ending before morning then cloudy. Fog patches becoming fog early this evening. Amount 2 mm. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early this evening. Wind becoming southwest 20 overnight. Low 7. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Sunday 08 May 2016

entry.title: Monday: Chance of showers. High 6 except 14 inland. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of showers in the morning. Showers beginning near noon. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Local amount 2 mm. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High 6 except 14 inland. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Sunday 08 May 2016

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low plus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: Rain showers ending early in the evening then partly cloudy. 40 percent chance of rain showers or flurries overnight. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming south 20 gusting to 40 near midnight. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Sunday 08 May 2016
